@haleycherea the 'March for Life' is in DC today so my Twitter will be ablaze with pro-choice tweets. Gotta keep people informed.
13% of maternal deaths globally are bc of unsafe abortions, this stat will rise bc of the resigning of the Mexico Policy.
Women die from illegal abortions, as many as 5,000 women a YEAR in the US died from illegal abortions before Roe V. Wade
Also, the abortion rate would rise if Planned Parenthood is defunded bc less birth control=more pregnancies.
There is no such thing as a 'late term abortion', it's a C-section and only accounts for 1.2% of terminations.
66% of abortions take place before 8 weeks gestation, 92% by 13 weeks.
Many women get abortions bc they don't have the resources/access to the resources to even have a healthy pregnancy, let alone a baby.
Also, yet again, if you are pro-life but don't support access to contraceptives, healthcare, and welfare, then you're pro-birth, not life.
Cause all of my friends that attended the Women's March said that the march was very hopeful and accepting. So where was the hate?
